attributes.background: He has served the entertainment of Britain a great deal, and has written many popular books, helped bring light to war stories and other fascinating history events. I think he has a varied following, but undoubtedly he has been a icon for the Britain

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
